com.intel.realsense.tracking

Class TrackingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.realsense.tracking.TrackingManager

  • public class TrackingManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Tracking Manager

    Provides static functions which initiate the tracking device.

      Tracking Manager Info

      static TrackingManager.Info getInfo(Context context)
      Checks the current state of the tracking devices on the system and returns a Info object
      static TrackingDevice getTrackingDevice(Context context)
      Checks whether an initialized Banner Ridge device is connected to the host and returns a TrackingDevice object
      static java.lang.String getVersion(Context context)
      Get the tracking library version.
      static void loadFirmware(Context context)
      Checks whether a Banner Ridge in boot mode is connected to the host and load the FW to the device
      static void resetTrackingDevice(Context context)
      Checks whether an initialized Banner Ridge device is connected to the host and reset it to DFU state.
